name: Fire War Car - Battle Robot
description:
Fire War Car - Battle Robot!!!
In the era modern futuristic robot battle play the challenging ultimate truck transformation robot game as a real superhero. Your duty as city hero robot is to kill, crash and destroy all the sinister and super villains to save civilians of vice city. Use kicks, punches, gun bullets and shoot missiles towards evil robots to cause them huge destruction. It is a situation where you have to kill for survival because the super dangerous robots will show no mercy and no fear.
Enjoy Top Car Transformation Game
Real-time physics base game
Iron Robot rescue game
